name: A Talk With Star
description:
Have you ever wanted to have a very short conversation with the mascot of a mediocre twitter artist? because I catch myself wanting to almost daily. This is a small little visual novel I created in a day while learning the mechanics of Ren.py, so you know it's gotta be good!

Music: Your Turn To Die (Kimi Ga Shine) by Nankidai

Sound Effects: Danganronpa by Spike Chunsoft

(pls don't sue me or whatever)
